<<<<<<< HEAD
Aut Helmont, aut asinus: or, St. George untrust being a full answer to his Smart scourge. G. S.
28 p.
printed for R. Lowndes, at the White Lion in S. Pauls Churchyard, London : 1665.
Signed on A3v: G.S. A reply to: Starkey, George. A smart scourge for a silly sawcy fool. Signatures: A-B (-A1, B8, blank?). Cropped and frayed at head with loss of most page numbers. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed for R. Lowndes, at the White Lion in S. Pauls Churchyard, London : 1665.
Signed on A3v: G.S. A reply to: Starkey, George. A smart scourge for a silly sawcy fool. Signatures: A-B (-A1, B8, blank?). Cropped and frayed at head with loss of most page numbers. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
R. Lowndes
the White Lion in S. Pauls Churchyard
